concept.title: Parameters and constraints panel
concept.shortdesc: The Parameters and Constraints panel offers a central location to view and modify parameters and constraints in the current drawing.

section.title: Parameter list
section.p: Displays a list of all the parameters and constraints in the drawing. They are organized in expandable categories which may include user parameters, 2D dimensional constraints, 3D dimensional constraints, 3D geometric constraints, block parameters and array parameters. Right-click menus offer additional tools for some parameters and constraints.

section.title: Name
section.p: Specifies the name of the parameter.

section.title: Expression
section.p: Specifies the mathematical expression of the parameter.

section.title: Value
section.p: Specifies the value resulting from the parameter’s expression.

section.title: New user parameter
section.p: Inserts a new user parameter with default values for the Expression and Value.

section.title: Delete a user parameter
section.p: Removes selected parameter and constraints from the drawing.

section.title: Show dependent parameters
section.p: Toggles the display of dependent parameters on or off.

section.title: Show defining parameters
section.p: Toggles the display of defining parameters on or off.

section.title: Hide geometrical constraints
section.p: Toggles the display of geometrical constraints on or off.

section.title: Search
section.p: Filters the parameter list to display only the parameter names that match the character string you enter.
